text: The Shymkent Zoo (, Shymkent haıýanhanasy; ) is the state zoo of the city Shymkent in Kazakhstan. It is one of the largest and oldest zoological parks in the country. From the total zoo's area of , under an exposition . The Shymkent Zoo contains more than 20 kinds of animals brought in the 'Red book'. 25% of requirements of forages for animals the zoo grow up on own earth, the area of . ==See also== *List of zoos *Almaty Zoo *Karaganda Zoo ==References== Category:Zoos in Kazakhstan Category:Shymkent Category:Zoos established in 1980
